title: Law Class of 2013 Scholarship Fund
description: To provide scholarship support for students enrolled in the Law School at the University of Colorado Boulder.  If $25,000 is raised within five years, the fund will be administered as a permanent endowment.
marketingContent: To provide scholarship support for students enrolled in the Law School at the University of Colorado Boulder. If $25,000 is raised within five years, the fund will be administered as a permanent endowment.
